page.title: 03Personal Appearance
page.content: In Leintwardine bright colours and pale coloured clothes are very popular with the young and old. Old people usually make their own clothes instead of buying them, but if they do buy them, they buy them from Hereford or Leominster.Old people don't like wearing make-up but will wear a bit when they go out.The young wear a lot. When we asked whether they liked tight clothes or baggy clothes they said baggy clothes because you have to be very thin to wear tight clothes.Most people don't really like punk hair-styles but said it was up to the people who have them.Old people said that they liked casual styles best,but the young didn't really mind.Most people went to the local hair-dresser, Angelique Beddoes, to have their hair done.
